title: 398 Perches Coconut Land For Sale in Uswetakeiyawa
details: Valuable property for sale in Uswetakeyyawa – St.Mary’s Road. Bordering Hamilton Cannel. Land area is 398 perches. Beautiful, calm, quiet, healthy & natural environment. More suitable for agricultural, Hotel, Apartment ecotourism or agro tourism activities. Price per perch is Rs. 400,000/=. For immediate sale. Please inform to inspect the land. Contact +94763174307
